title: Ticket #7379: Allow transfer_output_remaps when transfer_output_files unset
description:
Apparently transfer_output_remaps doesn't work when transfer_output_files is not specified, despite the latter meaning "transfer only new files from the sandbox root" and not "don't transfer any files".

Classified as a bug because transfer_output_remaps is not documented as requiring transfer_output_files.
remarks:
2019-Nov-14 16:37:09 by tlmiller:
... this seems to work, excepting HTCondor's bizarre refusal to create output subdirectories. What was the user actually complaining about?

2019-Nov-19 14:22:18 by tlmiller:
This, apparently, was all confusion.
